plot: While visiting Jim at work, Melinda gets a vision of a woman being cut with a knife from a disoriented and bloody man, who can only tell them he was being chased.

While concerned over the hospital not giving Jim enough time for sleep, Melinda meets a bloodied man haunted by a ghost that's not letting him sleep at all. Seems the man's late birth-father fears his son inheriting a family condition that will render him insane enough to kill. Melinda sets out to untangle the truths and identities involved (including that of a girl ghost) before any needless deaths occurs - not easy after the troubled man slips from the hospital psych ward.—statmanjeff
